comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From politicalgraveyard.com/bio/roberts2.html "Roberts, Donn M. (1867-1936) — of Indiana. Born in Annapolis, Crawford County, Ill., September 28, 1867. Mayor of Terre Haute, Ind., 1913-15. Convicted of bribery in 1915 and spent three and a half years in prison; convicted of embezzlement in 1936 and sentenced to prison. Released from prison following a heart attack, and died a few days later, in Terre Haute, Vigo County, Ind., August 3, 1936. Interment at St. Joseph's Cemetery, Terre Haute, Ind. "

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: visions.indstate.edu/cdm4/item_viewer.php?CISOROOT=/cth&a... shows the same (or very similar) photo identified as Mayor of Terre Haute.

comment._content: Swanq: thanks for the information and other photo of Donn M. Roberts. We will add some of it to the description for this photo when we update the database.
